Zoom Youtube Videos with OwlZoom

OwlZoom is an open-source project

How to use :
1.Select 'Zoom' form Youtube Settings button on the Youtube video you would like to Zoom.
2.Select how much zoom you need ( max is 2X ).
3.Scale using: SHIFT + ALT + (the arrow keys for directions )
4. To back to normal set to 100% or by pressing: SHIFT + B .

You can use it in all the three play modes in Youtube (Normal , Stage ,or Full screen )
Note : on 100% you won't be able to scale
